Experience Summary 
 Overall 15 Years of work experience in web development activities, requirement analysis, design, 
coding, maintenance and implementation of software system. 
 Expertise in Drupal 8 & 9, PHP & MySQL, Web Services API, E-commerce, HTML 5, JavaScript, React JS, 
CSS, MongoDB & CodeIgniter MVC Framework. 
 Skills in managing multiple tasks often with competing deadlines, self-motivated, strong team player. 
 Schedule tasks on daily/weekly basis, involving project effort estimations, coding and design efforts 
and integration and customization of the application and databases. 
 Solid experience working in IT Company Srijan Technologies, world leading advertising and digital 
agency like MRM McCann and innovative digital product engineering companies like Global logic etc.

Project Description 
 
Project Name: OpenDevPortal 
Website: https://www.drupal.org/project/opendevportal 
Description: 
OpenDevPortal is a product framework to build custom developer portals. Whether you're a SaaS 
company looking to publish APIs for App developers or a financial institution with a sprawling Open

OpenDevPortal is a product framework to build custom developer portals. Whether you're a SaaS 
company looking to publish APIs for App developers or a financial institution with a sprawling Open 
Banking API program, you can use OpenDevPortal to engineer a bespoke developer experience. 
 
Main features: 
 Multiple Developer Program 
 Customization at Program Level 
 Custom Domain support for each program 
 Different shades of Developer Program 
 Productisation of APIs using various features 
 Product & API Categorization 
 Multiple views supported for Open API Specifications 
 Rapidoc 
 Swagger 
 Async API Support 
 GraphQL Support 
 SDK download Support 
 User registration with email/Github id/Gmail id 
 User Dashboards 
 SAML/Github/Gmail login feature supported 
 Google Captcha for Authentication 
 Forum(For Community Support) 
 Issues (Organizational Support) 
 Custom Workflows 
 Notification(Email & Alerts) 
 Custom pages for branding/marketing

 Google Captcha for Authentication 
 Forum(For Community Support)

Project Name: Crohn's & Colitis Foundation 
Website: https://www.crohnscolitisfoundation.org/ 
Description: 
Crohn’s & Colitis Foundation is a non-profit, volunteer-fueled organization dedicated to finding cures for 
Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis, and improving the quality of life of children and adults affected by 
these diseases. The project involved implementing functionalities content builder, extensive 
customization of block-based components, several pages custom templating, and full use of Field API. 
 
Main features: 
 Worked on Migration development 
 Extensive use of Role Management 
 Developed many reusable components. 
 Extensive use of Cache Management features. 
 Luminate Online API is integrated with Webforms and user profiles.

Project Name: Diversey 
Website: https://diversey.com/en 
Description: 
Diversey,  Inc.  is  a  provider of  cleaning  and  hygiene  products  serving  customers  in  the  hospitality, 
healthcare, food and beverage, food service, retail and facility management sectors. The project involved

healthcare, food and beverage, food service, retail and facility management sectors. The project involved 
building the content and product-based management system to make it customized for the authors and 
editors. 
 
Main features: 
 Integrated Commerce features to browse the products. 
 Implemented multiple domain sites with various features. 
 Expose better role management as per domain. 
 Developed featured to clone menu items as per domain. 
 Implemented Product and Content bulk clones as per domain. 
 Implemented Solr search for content/product rendering and filters. 
 Worked on migration 
 Implemented a third-party API for social integration. 
 Integrated Product Review & Rating features.

Project Name: CRAINS 
Website: https://www.crain.com/capabilities/brands/ 
Description: 
Crain is one of the largest privately owned business media companies with 21 leading business, 
trade and consumer brands in North America, Europe and Asia. The project involved building a 
framework that contains a number of common features like Content Builder, Migration, Events, 
Newsletter Management, Blogging, Ads management and Single Sign On. It also involved developing 
a system where all community people can be managed through SSO. It also involved building an ad 
management system for the website. 
 
Main features:

a system where all community people can be managed through SSO. It also involved building an ad 
management system for the website. 
 
Main features: 
 Implemented single sign-on to enable common logging across people 
 Worked on Migration 
 Multisite Structure 
 Implemented the event and Newsletter management system 
 Implemented Solr search to consolidate data and its filters 
 Integrated 3rd party integration to develop Ads Management. 
 Worked on Cache Management System 
 Responsibilities included client interaction, assisting team members with tech issues and client demos
